    Internal Gaussian Spot-GLM Solver

    spot_glm_gaussian.Rd

    Fits a Gaussian GLM for spatial transcriptomics data with optional fixed coefficients. Used internally by spot_glm when the family is "spot gaussian".

    spot_glm_gaussian(X, y, lambda, fix_coef, beta_0)

    Arguments

    X

    Design matrix (spots × covariates).

    y

    Response vector.

    lambda

    Deconvolution matrix (spots × cell types).

    fix_coef

    Logical matrix indicating which coefficients to fix (TRUE = do not update).

    beta_0

    Initial coefficient matrix (covariates × cell types).

    Value

    A list containing:

    beta

    Estimated coefficient matrix.

    vcov

    Variance-covariance matrix of estimated coefficients.

    sigma.sq

    Residual variance estimate.

    Contents

    Developed by Kaishu Mason.
